data.claim: The real improvement from memory + action upgrades isn't a percentage - it's a category change: from "smart assistant" to "operational agent." The difference is end-to-end workflow execution (browse, write docs, send emails, schedule, run code, persist results) vs research-and-suggest.
data.snippet: The improvement isn't '400%' in any scientific sense â€” it's more like: you move from a smart assistant to an operational agent. And that jump is the whole game.
